title: Chris Pratt (show jumping rider)
summary: Chris Pratt (born April 18, 1969) is a Canadian show jumping rider. He represented Canada in the 2006 FEI World Equestrian Games in Aachen, Germany. Pratt has been announced on the 2011 Canadian Show jumping Equestrian Team Short List. Pratt was recently announced on Canada's Long list for the 2011 Pan American Games.
